help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find answers and get support
help.welcomeTitle: Welcome to Fasal Guru Help Center
help.aboutText: Fasal Guru is your intelligent farming companion designed to empower farmers with real-time weather updates, crop advisory, market prices, and expert agricultural guidance. Our mission is to make farming smarter, easier, and more profitable.
help.learnEffectively: Learn how to use Fasal Guru effectively
help.issueDescription: Describe what went wrong or what you'd like to see...
help.feedbackIntro: We value your input! Help us improve Fasal Guru:
help.improvePlaceholder: Tell us what could be better...
help.suggestPlaceholder: Share your ideas for new features...
help.issueSubmitted: Issue reported successfully! We'll look into it.
help.feedbackSubmitted: Thank you for your valuable feedback!

faqContent.createAccount: To create an account, click on the 'Sign Up' button on the home page. Enter your mobile number, verify with OTP, and complete your profile with basic details like name and location.
faqContent.addFarmDetails: Go to Settings > Farm Profile. Click 'Add Farm' and enter details like farm size, soil type, current crops, and irrigation method. You can add multiple farms.
faqContent.setupNotifications: Navigate to Settings > Account > Notification Preferences. Toggle on the notifications you want to receive - weather alerts, crop advisory, market prices, SMS, or email notifications.
faqContent.checkWeather: Click on 'Weather' in the main navigation. You'll see current weather, hourly forecast, and 7-day predictions for your farm location. Enable location services for accurate local weather.
faqContent.getCropAdvice: Select your crop from the Dashboard or Crop Advisory section. You'll receive tailored recommendations based on your crop type, growth stage, local weather, and soil conditions.
faqContent.accessMarketPrices: Go to 'Market Prices' from the dashboard. You can view prices for different crops in nearby mandis. Filter by crop type, date range, and location.
faqContent.useDiseaseDetection: Open 'Crop Disease' from navigation. Take a clear photo of the affected plant part. Our AI will analyze the image and provide diagnosis with treatment recommendations.
faqContent.connectExperts: Use the Voice Assistant to ask questions, or visit the Community section to connect with experts. You can also contact our support team for personalized assistance.
faqContent.updateProfile: Go to Settings > Account > Profile Information. Here you can edit your name, phone, email, location, and profile photo.
faqContent.changePassword: Navigate to Settings > Privacy & Security. Enter your current password and new password to update. Make sure to use a strong password with letters, numbers, and symbols.
faqContent.manageMultipleFarms: In Settings > Farm Profile, you can add multiple farms. Each farm can have its own settings for size, crops, and irrigation. Switch between farms from the dashboard.
faqContent.deleteAccount: Go to Settings > Privacy & Security > Delete Account. Please note this action is irreversible and will delete all your data. Consider exporting your data first.
faqContent.appNotLoading: Try these steps: 1) Check your internet connection, 2) Clear app cache in Settings > Data, 3) Refresh the page, 4) Try using a different browser, 5) Contact support if issue persists.
faqContent.notificationsNotWorking: Ensure notifications are enabled in Settings. Check your browser/device notification permissions. Make sure you're not in Do Not Disturb mode.
faqContent.locationIssues: Allow location access in your browser settings. Ensure GPS is enabled on your device. You can also manually enter your location in Settings.
faqContent.loginProblems: If you can't login: 1) Check your phone number/email, 2) Reset password if forgotten, 3) Try OTP login, 4) Contact support with your registered details.
faqContent.dataUsage: Your data helps us provide personalized recommendations. We use farm data for crop advice, location for weather updates, and usage patterns to improve services. We never sell your personal data.
faqContent.isDataSecure: Yes! We use industry-standard encryption for all data. Your password is securely hashed, and all communications are encrypted. We regularly audit our security practices.
faqContent.exportData: Yes, go to Settings > Data Management > Export Data. You can download all your data in CSV or PDF format including farm details, crop history, and recommendations.

footer.builtWith: Built with React, TypeScript & Tailwind CSS
